transArray.content: Overall, it was okay. At that time, we booked a king bed room with a view. The bed was 1.5 meters, and our family of three couldn't live there. The front desk said that Huazhu members can change rooms for free, and finally changed to a twin room. I slept very comfortably. , The overall sanitation is mediocre, the toilet is smelly, and it feels very unclean, and there is no makeup mirror. I stayed for two nights and put on makeup in the dark...
